mapper.select: select * from (select comment_no , comm_no , user_id , contents , date , up_date , state , b.group_no , display_order_no , c.new_display_order_no as new_display_order_no from community_comment b left outer join (select a.group_no, max(a.display_order_no) + 1 as new_display_order_no from community_comment a where a.comm_no = #{commNo} group by a.group_no) c on b.group_no = c.group_no order by group_no asc, display_order_no asc) abc where comm_no = #{commNo}
